headerClassName.description: Custom className applied on every Table header element

headersProps.description: Custom props applied on every Table header element

cellClassName.description: Custom className applied on every Table cell element

cellProps.description: Custom props applied on every Table cell element

rowClassName.description: Custom className applied on every Table row element

rowProps.description: Custom props applied on every Table row element

onClick.description: Callback triggered when a Table cell is clicked

propsCallback.description: A function to add custom props depending on Table row and column
